abstract: Charter Communications has named Thomas M. Rutledge as its new chief executive, days after he resigned from his post as chief operating officer at Cablevision.
snippet: Charter Communications has named Thomas M. Rutledge as its new chief executive, days after he resigned from his post as chief operating officer at Cablevision.
lead_paragraph: Charter Communications, one of the nation’s biggest cable providers, on Monday named Thomas M. Rutledge its new chief executive, days after he resigned from his post at Cablevision.

headline.main: Rutledge Named Chief of Charter Communications
